item.title: Performing Advanced Risk Hunting in Defender for Cloud
item.description: Microsoft Defender for Cloud's Cloud Security Explorer provides security teams with an intuitive visual interface to investigate their cloud security posture. It excels at helping users explore relationships between resources, identities, permissions, and vulnerabilities while surfacing potential misconfigurations and risky assets that could be vulnerable to attacks and breaches. But what happens when you need to go deeper than what the UI can offer?
